mapper.select:
select id, code, name, `space`, create_date, images, price from space_info where 1 = 1
AND code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{spaceInfo.code},'%')
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{spaceInfo.name},'%')
order by create_date desc

select si.id, si.code, si.name, si.`space`, si.create_date, si.images, si.price from space_info si left join space_status_info ssi on (ssi.space_id = si.id) where 1 = 1 and ssi.status = '0' order by create_date desc
